charges.charge_description: (Probable Cause Complaint) On 6/15/92 the deft arrived at JFK &; after consenting to an x-ray exam foreign bodies were found in her intestinal tract. Deft was then taken to the Medical Facility where she passed balloons which revealed &; tested positive for heroin. Deft did knowingly &; intentionally import heroin, a Schedule I narcotic drug controlled substance into the US in violation of 21:952(a) &; 960(a)(1).
